title: Remake Wait Queue
body: Hi! I waited a 20 min queue and then remade the game. Afterwards it didn't take off from my 5 wait queues. I now have to wait another 20 min without playing another game. Can you tell me if this is on purpose or not? If it isn't can you find a solution for it?

replies.body:
In order to work off a low-priority queue, a *full game* must be played. This means either a game that ends in victory/defeat or a surrender. 

Let me know if you have any other questions.
You need to play and complete a game in order to reduce a low priority queue.
